General.Name: Green Cross Medical Science Corporation
General.Description: Green Cross Medical Science Corporation manufactures and sells diagnostic reagents and medical devices in South Korea and internationally. The company offers molecular, immunology, biochemistry, microbiology, and other diagnostic reagents. It also provides diagnostic instruments; blood bags; home medical devices; blood dialysis products; and HbA1c/BGMS products to monitor and measure hemoglobin and blood glucose. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
